docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, Sept. 30--Indignation over Nazi agitation in Uruguay was growing throughout the country today following an incident at a patriotic ceremony on the historic Las Pledras battlefield.

docs.snippet: Rio de Janeiro Federal District of the United States of Brazil is to announce that funds have been remitted in payment of interest on its outstanding five-year 6 per cent bonds due on April 11, 1933, for the six-months period ended on Oct. 1.
